caption: The photograph captures a young individual performing a wheelie on a bicycle. The person is a youth with medium-length hair, appearing focused and balanced while riding. They are dressed in a plaid shirt and dark pants, riding a red bicycle. The street they are on looks quiet and residential, bordered by houses displaying a mix of textures, including weathered wooden sidings and a brick façade. The street is paved but shows signs of wear and patches of grass. The overall atmosphere hints at a subdued, perhaps late-afternoon setting with soft lighting, contributing to a somewhat nostalgic feel. The image has a candid, spontaneous quality, emphasizing movement and youthful energy.
title: Look, Ma, one wheel. Billy Watkins of Mulky Square can ride like this for a whole block, has even offered to teach others the trick for a small fee - but so far has found no takers.
